item.description:
Spot on.
Open data is civic infrastructure.
Data standards are the railway gauges of the 21st century.
Congress mandating standardized access to medical records through open APIs + US government backing FHIR: https://t.co/zBBPHdGjeh created a new ecosystem of vaccine records https://t.co/eSZp94RsCp

item.title: #en @ 1481698071763374081
item.description:
This gave momentum to an upcoming open data model called FHIR and that led to SMART which provided a way to get FHIR info.
And that's why on the vaccine record page you see "SMART"!
It's not quite an RNA vaccine but still a huge step and a fun story.
https://t.co/tVcmWGKA2W
